title: Social Work Practical Training Education Through Simulated Patient Scenarios

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of social welfare concepts
context.additional_context: Utilization of simulated patient scenarios to replace real-world social welfare field experiences, incorporating smartphone-based supplementary materials in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Apply three essential counseling skills required in social welfare settings through simulated patient scenarios.
Analyze physical symptoms and emotional states observed in simulated patient simulations to propose appropriate intervention strategies.
Explain at least two areas for improvement identified during simulation performance through peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
